p: Differences in pharmacokinetic parameters (e.g., CL/F, V ss, AUC 0-∞) of SNEDDS formulation of TAL and control TAL powder was assessed by paired t-test using GraphPad Prism ® (4.5 version) for Windows (San Diego, CA, United States). The one-way ANOVA test followed by post hoc analysis was employed to compare the in vitro dissolution profiles and ex vivo permeability studies. p-Values ≤0.05, ≤0.001, ≤0.0001 were considered as statistically significant for all the data obtained from dissolution, ex vivo permeability and pharmacokinetic studies.
